articles.title: UK economy is improving but people may not notice - BBC.com
articles.description: Growth was stronger than expected, but millions of households are yet to feel the benefit.

articles.title: US set to impose 100% tariff on Chinese electric vehicle imports - Financial Times
articles.description: Move marks latest effort by Biden administration to protect domestic industry from cheap competition

articles.author: Anthony Wood
articles.title: 100 Days Later, Neuralink’s First Human Patient Is Now Using His Brain Implant to Play Slay the Spire - IGN
articles.description: The first human recipient of a Neuralink brain-computer interface has used the link to play Slay the Spire, and a number of other games during his time off, though the implant suffered a temporary drop in performance after a number of electrode-studded thread…
articles.content:
The first human Neuralink implant recipient is playing Slay the Spire, Old School RuneScape, and a range of other popular games by using the implant to translate his neural signals.

articles.author: Sophie Kiderlin
articles.title: Traders reassess Bank of England rate cuts as UK grows at fastest rate in nearly 3 years - CNBC
articles.description: A slew of commentary from the Bank of England and a better-than-expected economic growth number have left traders and investors scrambling to refine their bets.
